means: 急行，加速( speed的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I was left shouting abuse as the car sped off.
sentence.Network_cn: 汽车飞驰而去，留下我在那里大声咒骂。

sentence.Network_en: A car sped past, raising a cloud of dust.
sentence.Network_cn: 汽车飞驰而过, 卷起一阵尘土.

sentence.Network_en: He sped his car through the street.
sentence.Network_cn: 他开车飞速地穿过街道.

PerfectNetExp.abs: On they sped out of the darkness , perfect , glorious ., 她们快步走出了黑暗 , 显得那么纯洁 , 乐观.
he sped away on his bike ., 他飞快地骑着车走了.
The police car sped away , but failed to locate Georgos ., 警车飞驶而去 , 但未能找着乔戈斯的下落.
Ambulances , some covered with debris , sped past them , ferrying the injured to the waiting hospitals ., 救护车从巴士旁急驰而过 , 将伤员送往候诊医院 , 其中一些救护车周身是碎石瓦砾.

list.abs: thunderbolt sped by Jove's right hand sought out the height .朱庇特右手发射的霹雳总是寻找高处。
and telecommunications : the development of and sped up .邮电通信业：邮电通信业发展速度提高。
speed是什么意思_ speed翻译_... ... speed up a car 加快汽车的速度 sped production 加速生产 sped to the rescue 赶去救援.
On they sped out of the darkness , perfect , glorious ., 她们快步走出了黑暗 , 显得那么纯洁 , 乐观.

entry.def: Sped is a past tense and past participle of speed.
